title: Tesla’s Surprise Earnings Report, Twitter’s Q3 Miss, The Great Antitrust Awakening
itunes:title: Tesla’s Surprise Earnings Report, Twitter’s Q3 Miss, The Great Antitrust Awakening
description:
Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull and Ross Gerber, CEO at Gerber Kawasaki Wealth and Investment Management, break down Tesla’s surprise earnings report. Kurt Wagner, Bloomberg News Technology Reporter, walks through Twitter’s earnings miss. Ernesto Ramos, Portfolio Manager of the BMO Low Volatility Equity Fund, discusses his market outlook and investing in equities. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Joe Nocera talk about the latest antitrust news. And we Drive to the Close with Randy Watts, Chief Investment Strategist at William O’Neil & Co.

Hosts: Carol Massar Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
